description:
Light, bright and easy to power, all great qualities for a compact headlamp. With its warm white LED light in either a spot or a flood, the HL18R-T will help keep the trail in focus when you run out of daylight. With 5 different modes that take you from 30 lumens all the way to 500 and the ability to recharge over USB, or use AAA batteries, this versatile headlamp is a great adventure buddy.

  • Wider headband now uses a ratcheting dial to find that perfect fit. The increased width disperses the headlamp’s weight comfortably, and combined with the ratcheting closure, keeps your beam steadier when on the run
  • 5 modes, 3 in spotlight: high (3h at 500 lumens), medium (8h at 200 lumens), low (20h at 70 lumens), 2 in floodlight: low (30h at 30 lumens) and SOS (4h at 300 lumens)
  • 3 warm white LEDs provide both spot and flood lighting
  • Powered by included USB-rechargeable battery pack or 3AAA batteries (not included), giving you power options when away from USB ports or travelling (AAA batteries are common all over the world)
  • Covered micro-USB port makes charging easy
  • 4-level power indicator lets you know how your battery is doing, charging or discharging
  • 2-sided switch cycles through modes, locks the light out and provides access to boost mode
  • Ratcheting tilt housing means you can set the perfect light angle
  • IPX6 waterproofing means your light is ready for any weather
  • SOS mode is there if you need to call for help
  • In the box: HL18R-T, USB rechargeable battery (ARB-LP-1300), micro-USB cable, manual and warranty card
name: Fenix HL18R-T Rechargeable Headlamp
